recipe.name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado and season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Spread on toast and sprinkle chili flakes if desired.

recipe.name: Breakfast Burrito
instructions: Warm tortillas.
Scramble eggs and season.
Fill tortillas with eggs, beans, cheese, avocado, and salsa.
Roll into burritos and serve.

recipe.name: Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix chia seeds, almond milk, sweetener, and vanilla.
Let sit for 5 minutes and stir.
Refrigerate at least 2 hours or overnight.
Top with berries before serving.

recipe.name: French Toast
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Dip bread slices and cook on buttered skillet.
Serve with maple syrup.

recipe.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries.
Drizzle honey if desired and serve.

recipe.name: Oatmeal with Berries
instructions: Cook oats with liquid and salt.
Top with berries and sweetener.

recipe.name: Pancake
instructions: Mix dry and wet ingredients separately, then combine.
Cook batter in portions until bubbles form, flip.
Serve with syrup and butter.

recipe.name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk and seasoning.
Cook gently with butter until curds form.
Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend banana, berries, yogurt, and milk.
Serve topped with granola and fruit.

recipe.name: Indian Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté onions until golden.
Add garlic and ginger; cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Stir in spices and cook for 2 minutes.
Add veggies and water or coconut milk. Cover and simmer until veggies are tender (15–20 minutes).
Garnish with coriander and serve.

recipe.name: Veg Wrap
instructions: Spread hummus and mashed avocado on the wrap.
Layer with veggies and greens.
Season with salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon.
Roll tightly and slice in half.

recipe.name: Tuna Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Serve on lettuce leaves, whole grain toast, or as is.

recipe.name: Chickpea Bowl
instructions: Arrange cooked ingredients in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, and seasoning.
Toss gently and top with herbs.

recipe.name: Rice Veg
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic.
Add vegetables, cook until tender.
Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and stir well.
Serve hot, optionally with green onions on top.

recipe.name: Egg Muffin
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a bowl, whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Stir in chopped veggies and cheese (if using).
Pour into muffin tin (lightly greased).
Bake for 18–20 mins until set.
Cool slightly before serving or refrigerate for grab-and-go.

recipe.name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
instructions: Spiralize the zucchinis or use pre-spiralized ones.
Heat olive oil in a pan, lightly sauté zucchini noodles for 2–3 mins.
Remove from heat and toss with pesto, cherry tomatoes, salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Top with Parmesan and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Baked Salmon with Veggies
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place salmon and veggies on the tray, drizzle with olive oil, and season.
Add lemon slices on top of salmon.
Bake for 20 mins or until salmon is flaky and veggies are tender.

recipe.name: Stuffed Sweet Potato
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Wash and poke holes in sweet potatoes.
Bake for 30–35 mins until soft.
Mix black beans with cumin, salt, and lime juice.
Slice sweet potatoes open and mash slightly.
Fill with beans, avocado, yogurt, and herbs. Sprinkle chili flakes and serve hot.

recipe.name: Cucumber Rounds with Cream Cheese
instructions: Mix cream cheese with chopped herbs.
Spread the mixture on cucumber rounds.
Top with sesame seeds.
Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Avocado Rice Cake
instructions: Spread mashed avocado on rice cakes.
Top with lemon juice, chili flakes and salt.
Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Cottage Cheese Muesli Strawberry Bowl
instructions: Layer cottage cheese, oats, and strawberries in a bowl.
Drizzle with honey and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Tortilla with Shrimp and Avocado
instructions: Place the tortilla on a plate.
Layer avocado, red onion, and shrimps on top.
Fold the tortilla and serve.

recipe.name: Spicy Mango Salsa
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Stir gently and serve.

recipe.name: Guacamole Dip

ingredients.ingredient: Red chili flakes or fresh chopped chili

instructions: Mash the avocados in a bowl.
Add lime juice, garlic, tomato, onion, salt, black pepper, cilantro, and chili.
Mix well until combined.
Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Granola Bar with Nuts and Fruits
instructions: Mix oats, nuts, raisins, and candied fruits in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, combine honey and peanut butter, then heat slightly to melt.
Pour the honey mixture over the dry ingredients and stir.
Press into a lined pan and refrigerate for 20 minutes before cutting into bars.

recipe.name: Avocado Rice Cakes
instructions: Spread mashed avocado on rice cakes.
Top with lemon juice, chili flakes, and salt.
Serve immediately.

recipe.name: Dates with Coconut Shreds
instructions: Roll the pitted dates in the shredded coconut.
Press gently to coat them evenly with coconut.
Optionally, slice the dates in half and stuff them with almond or peanut butter before rolling in coconut.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for a few minutes.

recipe.name: Oatmeal Pudding with Blackberries
instructions: Combine oats, almond milk, honey, and vanilla extract in a bowl.
Let it sit in the fridge for at least 2 hours or overnight to thicken.
Top with fresh blackberries before serving.

recipe.name: Tomato Basil Soup
instructions: Heat oil in a pot. Sauté onions until translucent.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, broth, sugar, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20–25 minutes.
Add basil and blend until smooth.
Stir in coconut milk if using and heat through before serving.

recipe.name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Heat oil in a pot. Sauté onion, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add garlic and cook for another minute.
Stir in lentils, cumin, paprika, and bay leaf.
Pour in broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30–35 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Remove bay leaf, stir in lemon juice, and adjust seasoning before serving.

recipe.name: Creamy Mushroom Soup
instructions: Melt butter in a pot. Add onion and cook until soft.
Add garlic and mushrooms. Cook until mushrooms release moisture and soften.
Stir in thyme and flour. Cook for 1–2 minutes.
Gradually add broth, stirring constantly.
Simmer for 15–20 minutes. Blend part of the soup for creaminess, if desired.
Stir in cream, season with salt and pepper, and garnish with parsley before serving.

recipe.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Grease ramekins with butter.
Melt butter and chocolate together, stir until smooth.
In a bowl, beat eggs, yolks, and sugar until thick.
Fold chocolate mixture into eggs, then sift in flour.
Divide into ramekins and bake for 12–14 mins.
Serve warm with ice cream if desired.

recipe.name: Classic Cheesecake
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C).
Mix crumbs, butter, and sugar. Press into pan.
Beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until smooth.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well. Stir in sour cream.
Pour over crust and bake for 1 hour.
Cool, then chill at least 4 hours before serving.

recipe.name: Strawberry Shortcake
instructions: Toss strawberries with sugar; set aside.
Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Mix flour, baking powder, and salt. Cut in butter.
Add milk and stir just until combined.
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet and bake 12–15 mins.
Split shortcakes, fill with strawberries and cream.

recipe.name: Banana Pudding
instructions: Whisk pudding mix with cold milk for 2 mins.
Fold in whipped topping.
Layer wafers, banana slices, and pudding in a dish.
Repeat layers and top with extra whipped topping.
Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

recipe.name: Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar over a double boiler until thick and pale. Cool slightly.
Whisk in mascarpone until smooth.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream to stiff peaks and fold into the mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers briefly in espresso and layer in a dish.
Spread half of the cream mixture over ladyfingers. Repeat layers.
Cover and chill for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Dust with cocoa powder before serving.
